find_path_v2.description: Finds the shortest path to a target coordinate, correctly handling all collision types, one-way ledges, and treating 'PIT' tiles and warps as impassable unless they are the target or in an override list. Returns a list of button strings.

history.commit_message: Enhanced ledge hop collision logic and added safe_overrides for Ecruteak Gym (6,7).
Refined ledge logic and added safe_overrides for Ecruteak Gym. Added empty list fallback to prevent JSON errors.
Refined ledge logic and added safe_overrides for Ecruteak Gym. Added empty list fallback to prevent JSON errors.
Fixed JSON error by returning empty list on failure and added Ecruteak Gym override.
Updated collision logic for Route 41 (WATER, BUOY, WHIRLPOOL) and treated 'unseen' as traversable for exploration. Changed return type to a list of button strings for autopress support.
Fixing player tile detection and adding more traversable types. Returning button list for autopress support.
Added handling for warps and pits as valid targets and included a commit message.
Fixed the script to actually call the solution function.
Updated ledge collision logic to match XML tile types (LEDGE_HOP_DOWN, etc.).
Fixed ledge collision logic to check both current and target tiles for hop direction.
Initial definition of find_path_v2 for robust water navigation.
